segments.text: I notice the boy reaching into the cookie jar, standing on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined, like he doesn’t care if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just watching him, waiting for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s too focused on the cookies to realize how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying that plate, completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t noticed the water spilling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is going to be a mess, and someone could slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like yelling at them to stop, but they wouldn’t hear me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just so careless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope nothing bad happens before someone finally pays attention.
segments.speaker: PAR
